com.data_access

Class AbstractDAO<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.data_access.AbstractDAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The generic class.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientsDAO, OrderItemDAO, OrdersDAO, ProductsDAO

    public class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and executes the queries that are common to all the tables in the database.

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<T> findAll()
        Finds all the data that exists inside a table.
        Returns:
        A list objects of type T, objects that were found inside the searched table. If the table is empty returns null.

      • findById

        public T findById(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the object that is being searched.
        Returns:
        The object found in the table. If it's not found returns null.

      • createObjects

        private java.util.List<T> createObjects(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
        Creates a list of objects of type T. These objects were previously found in the database.
        Parameters:
        resultSet - The result of the query execution.
        Returns:
        A list of objects if type T.
